    notifyCancelledEntrants
    This sends a notification to all cancelled entrants 2.7.3: As an organiser I want to send a notification to all cancelled entrants
    notifyLottery
    This will send a notification to all chosen entrants (from lottery class) asking if they would like to accept or decline their invitation 2.5.1: As an organiser I want to send a notification to chosen entrants to sign up for events
    notifyLotteryNotificationForResponse
    This will send a notification to selected entrants (by lottery system) if they would like to accept or decline their invitation (we are still waiting on their response) 2.7.2: As an organiser I want to send notifications to all selected entrants
    notifyWaitingListEntrants
    This will send a notification to all entrants on the waiting list, whether they have been chosen or not 2.7.1: As an organiser I want to send notifications to all entrants on the waiting list
